sentences.en: He cleaned the flakes away with his coat sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他用大衣袖子把碎屑掸掉。

sentences.en: His work clothes, having become saturated with oil, had to be cleaned.
sentences.cn: 他的工作服已经被油浸透，该洗洗了。

sentences.en: I had your rooms cleaned and aired.
sentences.cn: 我请人打扫了你的房间并通了风。

sentences.en: It has cleaned up at the box office.
sentences.cn: 它在票房上赚得盆满砵满。

sentences.en: Johnny, go inside and get cleaned up.
sentences.cn: 约翰尼，进去把自己收拾干净。

sentences.en: Mary cooked and cleaned for them.
sentences.cn: 玛丽为他们做饭、打扫卫生。

sentences.en: Natural-filled duvets must be dry-cleaned by a professional.
sentences.cn: 天然填充的羽绒被必须交由专业人士干洗。

sentences.en: She cleaned a small segment of the painting.
sentences.cn: 她擦干净了这幅画的一小部分。

sentences.en: She got up early and cleaned the flat.
sentences.cn: 她早早就起了床，把公寓打扫干净。

sentences.en: She meticulously cleaned the gun and locked it away in its case.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地把枪擦拭干净，放进枪盒里锁好。

sentences.en: The brothers cleaned up a profit in the property market.
sentences.cn: 那兄弟几个在房地产市场捞了一笔钱.

sentences.en: The flat had been meticulously cleaned.
sentences.cn: 公寓被仔仔细细地打扫过了。

sentences.en: The thieves took the jewels and then cleaned out.
sentences.cn: 那些贼拿了首饰,匆匆而去.

sentences.en: This garment must be dry-cleaned only.
We cleaned the house manically over the weekend.
sentences.cn: 周末，我们干劲十足地把屋子打扫了一遍。

sentences.en: With them also lived Mary Burinda, who cooked and cleaned.
sentences.cn: 和他们同住的还有玛丽·伯琳达，她负责做饭和打扫卫生。

trans.tran_en: If you clean a room or house, you make the inside of it and the furniture in it free from dirt and dust

trans.tran_cn: （使）清洁( clean的过去式和过去分词 )，变干净，除去…的灰尘，使…干净
